feed.title: GitHub Fortran Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Fortran in GitHub

entry.title: CVMix/CVMix-src
entry.summary: CVMix source code (including protex documentation) as well as build system and examples / tests

entry.title: MCSclimate/MCT
entry.summary: Model Coupling Tookit

entry.title: E3SM-Project/Ocean-BGC
entry.summary: This repository will house the columnized ocean BGC modules

entry.title: BeTR-biogeochemistry-modeling/sbetr
entry.summary: Standalone implementation of BeTR, the Biogeochemical Transport and Reaction module

entry.title: NGEET/fates
entry.summary: repository for the Functionally Assembled Terrestrial Ecosystem Simulator (FATES)

entry.title: MPP-LSM/MPP
entry.summary: Multi-Physics Problem (MPP) library is a standalone library that solves biophysics problems relevant to global land surface models (LSMs).

entry.title: CFMIP/COSPv2.0
entry.summary: COSP - The CFMIP (Cloud Feedbacks Model Intercomparison Project) Observation Simulator Package

entry.title: esmf-org/esmf
entry.summary: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.

entry.title: E3SM-Project/E3SM
entry.summary: Energy Exascale Earth System Model source code.

entry.title: E3SM-Project/scream
entry.summary: Exascale global atmosphere model written in C++ as part of the E3SM project

entry.title: wrf-model/WRF
entry.summary: The official repository for the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model

entry.title: cp2k/cp2k
entry.summary: Quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package

entry.title: firemodels/fds
entry.summary: Fire Dynamics Simulator

entry.title: earth-system-radiation/rte-rrtmgp
entry.summary: RTE+RRTMGP is a set of codes for computing radiative fluxes in planetary atmospheres.

entry.title: OpenFAST/openfast
entry.summary: Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.

entry.title: Reference-LAPACK/lapack
entry.summary: LAPACK development repository

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/GEOS_OceanGridComp
entry.summary: GEOS Ocean Gridded Component

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/GEOSgcm_GridComp
entry.summary: Repository containing the physics and IAU code for the GEOS Earth System Model

entry.title: Goddard-Fortran-Ecosystem/pFUnit
entry.summary: Parallel Fortran Unit Testing Framework

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/GOCART
entry.summary: GOCART Aerosol model including process library and framework interfaces (MAPL, NUOPC, and CCPP)

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/GMAO_Shared
entry.summary: Repository for GEOS Earth System Model shared infrastructure

entry.title: NOAA-EMC/WW3
entry.summary: WAVEWATCH III

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/FVdycoreCubed_GridComp
entry.summary: MAPL/ESMF wrapper for the cubed-sphere finite volume dynamical core

entry.title: GEOS-ESM/MAPL
entry.summary: MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)
